dcterms:description: A dataset widely recognized as a benchmark for VI-ReID tasks, encompassing 491 individuals captured from six distinct non-overlapping view cameras, consisting of four visible cameras and two infrared cameras.
dcterms:title: SYSU-MM01

dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 412 different individuals, each with 10 visible images and 10 infrared images, used for evaluating visible-infrared person re-identification.
dcterms:title: RegDB
